verses.verse: And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G5055>made<s%> an <S%G5055>end<s%> of <S%G1299>commanding<s%> his <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> he <S%G3327>departed<s%> <S%G1564>there<s%> to <S%G1321>teach<s%> and to <S%G2784>preach<s%> in their <S%G4172>cities.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when <S%G2491>John<s%> had <S%G191>heard<s%> in the <S%G1201>prison<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> he <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> of his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%>
And <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G1488>Are<s%> you he that should <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> do we <S%G4328>look<s%> for <S%G2087>another?<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G4198>Go<s%> and <S%G518>show<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G518>again<s%> those things <S%G3739>which<s%> you do <S%G191>hear<s%> and see: <S%G991><s%>

The <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G308>receive<s%> their <S%G308>sight,<s%> and the <S%G5560>lame<s%> <S%G4043>walk,<s%> the <S%G3015>lepers<s%> are <S%G2511>cleansed,<s%> and the <S%G2974>deaf<s%> <S%G191>hear,<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%> are <S%G1453>raised<s%> up, and the <S%G4434>poor<s%> have the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> <S%G2097>preached<s%> to them.
And <S%G3107>blessed<s%> is he, whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> shall not be <S%G4624>offended<s%> in me.

And as they <S%G4198>departed,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> to the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> you out <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%> to <S%G2300>see?<s%> A <S%G2563>reed<s%> <S%G4531>shaken<s%> with the wind? <S%G417><s%>

But <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> you out for to <S%G1492>see?<s%> A <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G294>clothed<s%> in <S%G3120>soft<s%> <S%G2440>raiment?<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> they that <S%G5409>wear<s%> soft <S%G3120><s%> clothing are in <S%G935>kings'<s%> houses. <S%G3624><s%>
But <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> you out for to <S%G1492>see?<s%> A <S%G4396>prophet?<s%> <S%G3483>yes,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, and <S%G4055>more<s%> than a prophet. <S%G4396><s%>

For <S%G3778>this<s%> is he, of <S%G3739>whom<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> I <S%G649>send<s%> my <S%G32>messenger<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> your <S%G4383>face,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> shall <S%G2680>prepare<s%> your <S%G3598>way<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> you.

<S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G1722>Among<s%> them that are <S%G1084>born<s%> of <S%G1135>women<s%> there has not <S%G1453>risen<s%> a <S%G3187>greater<s%> than <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G910>Baptist:<s%> notwithstanding he that is <S%G3398>least<s%> in the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> is <S%G3187>greater<s%> than he.

And from the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G910>Baptist<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G737>now<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G971>suffers<s%> <S%G971>violence,<s%> and the <S%G973>violent<s%> <S%G726>take<s%> it by force. <S%G726><s%>
For <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> and the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G4395>prophesied<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> John. <S%G2491><s%>
And <S%G1487>if<s%> you <S%G2309>will<s%> receive <S%G1209><s%> it, <S%G846>this<s%> is <S%G2243>Elias,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was for to come. <S%G2064><s%>
He that <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3775>ears<s%> to <S%G191>hear,<s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>

But <S%G5101>whereunto<s%> shall I <S%G3666>liken<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1074>generation?<s%> It is <S%G3664>like<s%> to <S%G3808>children<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> in the <S%G58>markets,<s%> and <S%G4377>calling<s%> to their fellows, <S%G2083><s%>
And <S%G3004>saying,<s%> We have <S%G832>piped<s%> to you, and you have not <S%G3738>danced;<s%> we have <S%G2354>mourned<s%> to you, and you have not lamented. <S%G2875><s%>
For <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G2068>eating<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G4095>drinking,<s%> and they <S%G3004>say,<s%> He <S%G2192>has<s%> a devil. <S%G1140><s%>

The <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2068>eating<s%> and <S%G4095>drinking,<s%> and they <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5314>gluttonous,<s%> and a <S%G3630>drunkard,<s%> a <S%G5384>friend<s%> of <S%G5057>publicans<s%> and <S%G268>sinners.<s%> But <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> is <S%G1344>justified<s%> of her children. <S%G5043><s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> he to <S%G3679>upbraid<s%> the <S%G4172>cities<s%> <S%G1722>wherein<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G4118>most<s%> of his <S%G1411>mighty<s%> works were <S%G1096>done,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G3340>repented<s%> not:

<S%G3759>Woe<s%> to you, <S%G5523>Chorazin!<s%> <S%G3759>woe<s%> to you, <S%G966>Bethsaida!<s%> for <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G1411>mighty<s%> works, <S%G3588>which<s%> were <S%G1096>done<s%> in you, had been <S%G1096>done<s%> in <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> and <S%G4605>Sidon,<s%> they would have <S%G3340>repented<s%> <S%G3819>long<s%> <S%G3819>ago<s%> in <S%G4526>sackcloth<s%> and ashes. <S%G4700><s%>

But I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, It shall be <S%G414>more<s%> <S%G414>tolerable<s%> for <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> and <S%G4605>Sidon<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G2920>judgment,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> for you.

And you, <S%G2584>Capernaum,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G5312>exalted<s%> to <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> shall be <S%G2601>brought<s%> <S%G2601>down<s%> to <S%G86>hell:<s%> for <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G1411>mighty<s%> works, <S%G3588>which<s%> have been <S%G1096>done<s%> in you, had been <S%G1096>done<s%> in <S%G4670>Sodom,<s%> it would have <S%G3306>remained<s%> <S%G3360>until<s%> <S%G4594>this<s%> day. <S%G4594><s%>

But I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, That it shall be <S%G414>more<s%> <S%G414>tolerable<s%> for the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G4670>Sodom<s%> in the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G2920>judgment,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> for you.

<S%G1722>At<s%> that <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> I <S%G1843>thank<s%> you, O <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> and <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you have <S%G613>hid<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things from the <S%G4680>wise<s%> and <S%G4908>prudent,<s%> and have <S%G601>revealed<s%> them to babes. <S%G3516><s%>
Even <S%G3779>so,<s%> <S%G3962>Father:<s%> for <S%G3779>so<s%> it seemed <S%G1096><s%> <S%G2107><s%> <S%G2107>good<s%> in your sight. <S%G1715><s%>

<S%G3956>All<s%> things are <S%G3860>delivered<s%> to me of my <S%G3962>Father:<s%> and <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1921>knows<s%> the <S%G5207>Son,<s%> but the <S%G3962>Father;<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G1921>knows<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G1508>save<s%> the <S%G5207>Son,<s%> and he to whomsoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G1014>will<s%> reveal <S%G601><s%> him.
<S%G1205>Come<s%> to me, all <S%G3956><s%> you that <S%G2872>labor<s%> and are heavy <S%G5412>laden,<s%> and I will give you rest. <S%G373><s%>

<S%G142>Take<s%> my <S%G2218>yoke<s%> on you, and <S%G3129>learn<s%> of me; for I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G4235>meek<s%> and <S%G5011>lowly<s%> in <S%G2588>heart:<s%> and you shall <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G372>rest<s%> to <S%G5216>your<s%> souls. <S%G5590><s%>
For my yoke <S%G2218><s%> is <S%G5543>easy,<s%> and my <S%G5413>burden<s%> is light. <S%G1645><s%>
